meaning_str.bing:
n. 冬季；冬天
adj. 冬天的；越冬的；冬播的
v. 过冬
网络. 温特；冬装；寒冬

冬季；冬天；一年中最冷的季节；<文>年；岁
冬季的；越冬的；冬天生长的；冬季成熟的；冬播的
过冬；越冬；为冬季做准备

1.en: In this inexplicable fear, the only snow of the winter that's happy to re-ignite the fire of my hope, I feel perfect security.
1.cn: 在这种莫名其妙的恐惧里，唯有那些有雪的冬季里的快乐能够重燃我的希望之火，让我感到无懈可击的安全。

2.en: Originally, when the Winter hope a few months of life, only a few days did not expect to feel tired, feel bored, and felt the emptiness.
2.cn: 本来这时盼了几个月的寒假生活，没想到才几天就感到厌倦了，就感到无聊了，就感到空虚了。

3.en: Midwife Farangis Sultani tells the story of a woman who was in a great deal of pain last winter.
3.cn: 助产员法拉基斯·苏坦克讲述了去年冬天一名忍者剧痛生产的妇女的故事。

1.en: Now it's winter, and it's really time for you to go.
1.cn: 你看冬天已经来了，你们是该动身的时候了。

2.en: Like I was wrong about you making it through that first winter.
2.cn: 就像曾经我误以为你会活不过第一个冬天。

3.en: In your pajamas? Yes. Without shoes? Yes. On a cold winter's night? Yes.
3.cn: 穿着睡衣去？是啊。还没穿鞋去？是啊。大冬天三更半夜去？是啊。

4.en: Winter is upon us. We must look to our own, to the sick, and the helpless.
4.cn: 冬天就要来了，我们只能靠自己，照顾受伤的人和其他需要帮助的人。

5.en: They are like winter thunder on a wild wind rolling in from a distance, breaking hard in alarm.
5.cn: 他们就像冬天狂风里的惊雷，从远方滚滚而来，打破寂静。

6.en: Now given that winter is coming, one can only assume she's signaling sexual availability.
6.cn: 既然冬天都已经到了，只能说明她是在暗示，她可以作为做爱对象。

7.en: This seat is ideally located both in relation to the heat source in the winter and a cross breeze in the summer.
7.cn: 这个位置正好，能在冬天吹到暖气，夏天吹到对流风。

8.en: That was a difficult winter. A blizzard had trapped half our battalion behind the German line.
8.cn: 那年冬天，天气恶劣，暴风雪把我们一半的部队困在德军防线里。

9.en: Does she sleep through the winter, like Tiddles? No. Oh. Where is Tiddles? Tiddles.
9.cn: 那么她也会像小土豆那样睡一个冬天吗？不会。噢！小土豆去哪儿了？小土豆！

10.en: Can you not see that l have bigger problems? Winter is almost here and I have an entire village to feed!
10.cn: 你看不出我有更大的问题吗?冬天就快到了，我得喂饱全村的村民!

11.en: Look, I really need your help. Winter's coming. You don't want me to go to sleep and never wake up.
11.cn: 你看，我真的需要你的帮助，冬天快要来了。你不会眼看着我一睡就醒不了吧。

12.en: Spray tan! Who needs a spray tan? Someone in winter. That's why you put a coupon on a ice scraper.
12.cn: 美黑？谁需要做美黑？冬天没得晒太阳的人需要。所以美黑优惠劵就得跟冰铲配。

13.en: Sleep well, Tiddles. Tiddles has gone to sleep for the winter. He'll wake again in the spring time.
13.cn: 睡个好觉，小土豆。小土豆到了冬天就会进入梦乡。等春天来了，它才会醒过来。嘘！

14.en: Hello Tiddles. Tiddles has slept all through the winter. Why has he got that shell thing on his back?
14.cn: 你好啊，小土豆！知道吗，小土豆已经睡了一整个冬天了。哇。他为什么要背一个壳在身上呢？

15.en: Last winter I went up on a church lawn and drove right through a manger scene. The papers thought it was a hate crime.
15.cn: 去年冬天，我开车经过教堂的草地然后撞上马的食槽，报纸误以为那是一个报仇计划。

16.en: In the warm waters of the East China Sea, the kelp is grown through the winter, and then in spring hung to dry on bamboo poles before being harvested.
16.cn: 在东海的暖水里，海带在冬天生长。及春，她们将被挂在竹竿上晾干，以备收获。

17.en: So one winter, we asked students to keep track of the medications they took, the price they paid, and how well they felt afterwards.
17.cn: 在某一个冬天，我们让学生们逐笔记录他们所选择的治疗，他们支付的价格，以及治疗之后的感觉。

18.en: No, no, no, you see, in the winter, that seat is close enough to the radiator so that he's warm, yet not so close that he sweats.
18.cn: 不，不，不，你看啊，在冬天呢，这个座位与暖气片的距离足够让他保持温暖，但又不会太近以至于出汗。

19.en: It's not bed time yet. It's bed time for Tiddles. He sleeps all through the winter and wakes up in spring. That sounds nice.
19.cn: 现在还不到睡觉的时间呢。可是小土豆应该睡觉了。它要睡上整整一个冬天，然后在春天才醒过来。听上去可真不错。
